patthana3.6:1.1.pli: Noganthaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:4.1.pli: Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo ca nogantho akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.6:5.1.pli: Noganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.6:6.1.pli: Ganthaṃ akusalañca noganthaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:7.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:8.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:10.1.pli: Gantho akusalo dhammo ganthassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:11.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:15.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.6:16.1.pli: Noganthaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:19.1.pli: Ganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.6:20.1.pli: Aganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:21.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ, lokiyalokuttaragamanasadisaṃ.)

patthana3.6:23.1.pli: Ganthaniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:24.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:26.1.pli: Ganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.6:27.1.pli: Aganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.6:28.1.pli: Ganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca aganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:29.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ, lokiyalokuttaragamanasadisaṃ.)

patthana3.6:31.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:32.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:34.1.pli: Ganthasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.6:35.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana3.6:36.1.pli: Ganthasampayuttaṃ akusalañca ganthavippayuttaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:37.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:38.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha …pe… nakamme cattāri, navippayutte cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:40.1.pli: Ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo ganthasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:41.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte cha …pe… nissaye cha, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte cha …pe… avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:42.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:43.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:45.1.pli: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:46.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.

patthana3.6:48.1.pli: Ganthañceva ganthaniyañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.6:49.1.pli: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.6:50.1.pli: Ganthañceva ganthaniyaṃ akusalañca ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:51.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:52.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:54.1.pli: Gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthaniyassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:55.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:59.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.6:60.1.pli: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:61.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:63.1.pli: Ganthañceva ganthasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:64.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:65.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:67.1.pli: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:68.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:72.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.6:73.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.6:74.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ aganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:75.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:77.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:80.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.6:81.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ aganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.6:82.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca ganthavippayuttaṃ aganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:83.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:85.1.pli: Ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo ganthavippayuttassa ganthaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.6:86.1.pli: Ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo ganthavippayuttassa aganthaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:87.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.6:91.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.8:1.1.pli: Nonīvaraṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:4.1.pli: Nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo ca nonīvaraṇo akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:5.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:6.1.pli: Nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.

patthana3.8:7.1.pli: Nonīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.

patthana3.8:8.1.pli: Nīvaraṇañca nonīvaraṇañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchānīvaraṇañca uddhaccanīvaraṇañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:9.1.pli: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:11.1.pli: Nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo nīvaraṇassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:12.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:16.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.8:17.1.pli: Nonīvaraṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:18.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:20.1.pli: Nīvaraṇiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.8:21.1.pli: Anīvaraṇiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anīvaraṇiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:22.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:24.1.pli: Nīvaraṇiyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:25.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:27.1.pli: Nīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.8:28.1.pli: Anīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.8:29.1.pli: Nīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākatañca anīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:30.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.8:31.1.pli: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:32.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:34.1.pli: Nīvaraṇasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:35.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:37.1.pli: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:38.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:40.1.pli: Nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo ceva no ca nīvaraṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:41.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:43.1.pli: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇiyañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇiyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.8:44.1.pli: Nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo ceva no ca nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.8:45.1.pli: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇiyaṃ akusalañca nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ca nīvaraṇiyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:46.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:48.1.pli: Nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇiyo ceva no ca nīvaraṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:49.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:51.1.pli: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:52.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:54.1.pli: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto nīvaraṇiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.8:55.1.pli: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto anīvaraṇiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:56.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:58.1.pli: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto nīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.8:59.1.pli: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto anīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.8:60.1.pli: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākatañca nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ anīvaraṇiyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto nīvaraṇiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.8:61.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ, vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:1.1.pli: Noparāmāsaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:4.1.pli: Parāmāsaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.9:5.1.pli: Noparāmāsaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.9:6.1.pli: Parāmāsaṃ akusalañca noparāmāsaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:7.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:8.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.9:9.1.pli: Noparāmāso akusalo dhammo noparāmāsassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:10.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:11.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.9:12.1.pli: Noparāmāsaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:13.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:15.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.9:16.1.pli: Aparāmaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aparāmaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:17.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:19.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:20.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:22.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.9:23.1.pli: Aparāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aparāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.9:24.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca aparāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:25.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.9:26.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:27.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:29.1.pli: Parāmāsasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.9:30.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:31.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve) …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:32.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve (sabbattha dve) …pe… navippayutte dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavāropi …pe… sampayuttavāropi vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.9:33.1.pli: Parāmāsasampayutto akusalo dhammo parāmāsasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.9:34.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayutto akusalo dhammo parāmāsavippayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:35.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (majjhime ca ante ca ārammaṇādhipati), anantare dve …pe… sahajāte dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve, kamme dve, āhāre dve …pe… magge dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:36.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:37.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:39.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāsaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:40.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:42.1.pli: Parāmāsañceva parāmaṭṭhañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana3.9:43.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāsaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.9:44.1.pli: Parāmāsañceva parāmaṭṭhaṃ akusalañca parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāsaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:45.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:47.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso akusalo dhammo parāmaṭṭhassa ceva no ca parāmāsassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:48.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:49.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana3.9:50.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāsaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho ceva no ca parāmāso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:51.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.9:52.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto parāmaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.9:53.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto aparāmaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:54.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyalokuttaradukasadisaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.9:55.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto parāmaṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.9:56.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto parāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.9:57.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto aparāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.9:58.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca parāmāsavippayuttaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto parāmaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.9:59.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
